name: Super Cabezon
description:
A power plant has polluted a river  and has mutated some creatures. Super Cabezon has gain his power also by the power plant.  Kill the mutated creatures and clean the river. Get all the pills that you can to increase the head size

The game on the browser is a demo. You will have better gaming experience with the compressed file.

Controls

KEY D moves right

KEY A moves left

KEY W jumps

KEY SPACE  PRESSED charges the head  ( head has to be fully charged )

KEY SPACE RELEASED   to hit the creature
